name: Vanilluxe
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

abilities.name: Slippery Soles
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crushing Ice
attacks.effect: Does 10 more damage for each {C} in the Defending Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.
